select task.*, bare_metal.machine_model, bare_metal.machine_sn, workflow.friendly_name, ifnull((select count(*) from execution_log_details eld where eld.log_id = task.id and eld.status = 'succeeded' and instance_id is not null), 0) success_count, ifnull((select count(*) from execution_log_details eld where eld.log_id = task.id and instance_id is not null),0) total_count, ifnull((select count(*) from execution_log_details eld where eld.log_id = task.id and eld.status = 'succeeded' and instance_id is not null) / (select count(*) from execution_log_details eld where eld.log_id = task.id and instance_id is not null), 0) percent from task left join bare_metal on task.bare_metal_id = bare_metal.id left join workflow on task.work_flow_id = workflow.injectable_name left join user on task.user_id = user.id
bare_metal.machine_sn like #{searchKey} or bare_metal.machine_model like %#{searchKey}% or workflow.friendly_name like %#{searchKey}% or bare_metal.ip_array like %#{searchKey}%
